WorkPlace.Name: CROSS CAFE APS
WorkPlace.Description:
Cross Cafe er beliggende ved Vadestedet over Århus Å - lige i hjertet af smilets by. Kom forbi og nyd vores mange specialiteter og vores gode stemning. 

Gælder det den hyggelige caféstund eller en 3 retters menu i restauranten er Cross Café det rette valg. Vi magter alt fra hverdagens lækre brunch til weekendaftener med cool drinks & dj-s.

Vi glæder os til at se dig!

HiringOrg.Name: CROSS CAFE APS

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for fresh dishwashers to the Cross family.

Get a peermanent job, at one of the city´s best locations.

We are looking for fresh and happy people, who would like to run fast together with a strong team. Send application an CV to js@cross-cafe.dk

If you have any qustions about the above, then these can be asked per. mail.

#jobsforukraine
